requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
